title: 6 Months In! These past two weeks have been feeling weird.
post:
I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid. Super strange just feeling a bit out of my body? Not sure if this is a sign of maybe needing to increase dose or a sign that the Pristiq isn’t working any longer. 

Does anyone have similar experiences with Pristiq around 6 months?? Thank you!
disclosure: I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid
label: Mental_Health

title: 6 Months In! These past two weeks have been feeling weird.
post:
I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid. Super strange just feeling a bit out of my body? Not sure if this is a sign of maybe needing to increase dose or a sign that the Pristiq isn’t working any longer. 

Does anyone have similar experiences with Pristiq around 6 months?? Thank you!
comment: What dose are you on? I’m now on 100 and feel pretty stable most of the time. I do get weird dreams most nights though. If you really feel weird then I would definitely speak to your doctor
disclosure: get weird dreams most nights though
label: Other

title: 6 Months In! These past two weeks have been feeling weird.
post:
I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid. Super strange just feeling a bit out of my body? Not sure if this is a sign of maybe needing to increase dose or a sign that the Pristiq isn’t working any longer. 

Does anyone have similar experiences with Pristiq around 6 months?? Thank you!
comment: Been on 150 for nearly 2 yrs. Past 2 months I've been on the brand, not generic and I feel pretty good. Best part is I've been able to scale down stim meds for ADHD. Definitely discuss w/ your doc.
disclosure: I've been able to scale down stim meds for ADHD
label: Health

title: 6 Months In! These past two weeks have been feeling weird.
post:
I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid. Super strange just feeling a bit out of my body? Not sure if this is a sign of maybe needing to increase dose or a sign that the Pristiq isn’t working any longer. 

Does anyone have similar experiences with Pristiq around 6 months?? Thank you!
comment:
Thank you for the responses! Glad it’s going well for both of you!

I met with my doc today. I’ve started with and have been on 50mg, we’re going to see if 75mg makes a positive difference 🙏🏻
disclosure: I’ve started with and have been on 50mg
label: Health

title: Locally Owned Businesses
post:
Does anyone have a resource for a listing of locally owned businesses on Bonaire? I'm not having much luck finding anything like this. Maybe we can build it here!

I'm especially interested in: 

\- grocery stores 

\- restaurants 

\- dive shops
parent_comment: Wait, really? Only in the last two years? This isn't what I was told at all, super interesting. I felt like everyone was complaining about how everything has been owned by Dutch folks for decades. But maybe people were just frustrated, and I take this stuff to heart because my family is also from a place where the holiday home people have bought up almost everything, called themselves local because they own property, and use the businesses as passive money generators, which screws the people who actually live there year round. I'm curious, are you originally from Bonaire? Or NL? I'm heading back for a month this winter and I'd love to learn more about this.
comment:
Before Covid the rental and selling prices weren't as crazy as they are now. Plus Bonaire has been a direct part of the Netherlands since 2010 so the Dutch couldn't have owned everything for decades. Even in 2016 the house prices were quite low. 

Most holiday homes are rented and used as passive money generators by mostly Dutch homeowners. Which will be a problem for them in the future because of a new policy coming up. Renting homes for holiday rentals will not be allowed in residential areas.

I'm from Bonaire. I've lived in NL for quite some time though. Hit me up when you're in Bonaire.
label: Location

title: Medicated cycle success?
post: I’m getting super frustrated with the ttc process and need some encouraging stories. Have people had success with medicated cycles (letrozole)? We’re going to try letrozole, trigger, and TI this time and it will be our second medicated cycle. I’m already telling myself it probably won’t work but trying to stay positive :( how many cycles has it taken others? Any tips?
disclosure: We’re going to try letrozole, trigger, and TI this time and it will be our second medicated cycle
label: Health

title: Medicated cycle success?
post: I’m getting super frustrated with the ttc process and need some encouraging stories. Have people had success with medicated cycles (letrozole)? We’re going to try letrozole, trigger, and TI this time and it will be our second medicated cycle. I’m already telling myself it probably won’t work but trying to stay positive :( how many cycles has it taken others? Any tips?
comment:
I’m 34 weeks pregnant after 1 successful Letrozole cycle!
I did HCG trigger and 5mg of Letrozole for 5 days. 

Stay positive!!
label: Health

title: Medicated cycle success?
post: I’m getting super frustrated with the ttc process and need some encouraging stories. Have people had success with medicated cycles (letrozole)? disclosure: I did HCG trigger and 5mg of Letrozole
label: Health

title: Medicated cycle success?
post: I’m getting super frustrated with the ttc process and need some encouraging stories. Have people had success with medicated cycles (letrozole)? We’re going to try letrozole, trigger, and TI this time and it will be our second medicated cycle. I’m already telling myself it probably won’t work but trying to stay positive :( how many cycles has it taken others? Any tips?
comment:
I was feeling the same way going into my second cycle. I was devastated after I wasn’t pregnant the first and couldn’t be anything but negative.

Second cycle was full of negativity for me and I stopped symptom spotting. My husband was tired of me being negative and said “take a test already!”

It immediately became positive and I sobbed like a baby couldn’t believe it!! That was cycle 2!! And I believe it worked out this way for a reason 

First cycle my follicle was 19mm,we had people visiting, and it was just difficult because everything felt rushed.

Second cycle we had relations couple nights before the shot and then as they instructed and the boom 12DPO I got my positive and follicle was 22mm 😃

Not sure if follicle size matters but it made me feel more positive 

Tips: have sex a couple days before. Sperm can live up to 5 days in the uterus so you want it there waiting when the egg comes down. I laid down for 15 minutes after each time, with my legs up for 2 instead of peeing right after. And when my husband was “finishing up” I did not let him move and held him in place lol. Some doctors say it doesn’t matter but may have helped 🤷🏻‍♀️

Good luck 💞
label: Husband_BF

title: How did you first come across a scam and how did you feel at the time?
comment:
I was freshly 18, 11 years ago and I sold a phone on eBay. Didn’t know what I was doing, had no idea how PayPal worked and sent a payment request to an account 🤦‍♂️ sent the phone, out of pocket £300, obviously got nothing back and Royal Mail couldn’t stop the delivery by the time I got in touch. 

I basically felt like a prized idiot but only for a short while. Spent the next few weeks looking at every bit of information I could find on scams, scam prevention, trusted payment processes etc. Naivety was the problem with that one, it wasn’t even a good scam in hindsight. I was just stupid 😂
label: Age

title: Debating on a JP-5
post: I'm looking for a top of the line pcc that will be a ton of fun at the range and great for home defense and a good host for a suppressor. I know the JP-5 is overkill but I don't know about anything else really that's as good to shoot and as reliable and high quality. I'm also debating on which length to get between the 8.5", 10.5" or 14.5". I would love to get my hands on one but I don't believe there are any dealers in Southeast MI. If anyone has feedback or what their thought process was please let me know
comment:
I love my JP5 its been absolutely realiable and its my favorite gun to shoot. The locking pieces are kind of expensive at 100 a piece but having the ability to change them for factory ammo is awesome. Im sure it will be a great suppressor host. 

My wife refuses to shoot a regular Ar15 but she shot the JP5 and after [running the plate rack](https://imgur.com/a/68TmTk6) the first time she was hooked. 

If its going to be a suppressor host I would go for the 8.5 myself.
label: Possession

post: My fiancee that I've been with for 5 years has had an affair with a coworker and I'm devastated. I have two children with her and another child from a different relationship. My first child has always known her as mommy because she's been the closest thing to a real mom that she's ever known. My heart is broken for my children and for my relationship. I can't give her another chance and I honestly thought this was my soulmate

title: is there anyone here for whom 4-ho-met just doesnt work?
post:
So i dosed exactly 25mg at the start and found it to be pretty underwealming so i redosed 10mg after 1,5h (both orally). The most effects i got from it was merging of the environment, but not in a cool way it looked like everything i see just losed details and was pretty blank. Not even mid visuals so im really suprised what people talk about these substance.
This has to be the worst substance i  have ever taken to be honest, absolutely nothing entertaining about it. 
Oh and i absolutely hated that everything on this substance seemd speed up. It was really hard to enjoy music on this because i thought my yt was set up to 1,25x speed lol.
Is there anyone with similiar experience?
parent_comment: Yup the headspace on homet (at least for me) is nonexistent, like for real nothing...
comment:
Oh i definitely get a headspace from high enough doses of ho met but it's just hilarious confusion and hasn't brought any real insight unlike shrooms.

It feels like my adhd is amplified x100 and my thought just are happening very fast and overlapping, making the whole thing chaotic and hard to make sense of.

Had to go to the shop because i realized I had no more food and spent 30 minutes looking for something then forgetting what i was looking for then just walking aimlessly until i realized it and started looking for something else hahahaha
label: Health

title: Brand new!! To diagnosis and meds
post:
Thank you so much for creating this group. I am so in over my head.  

Last month I was diagnosed with t2d. I am in my early 30s and am 5’5” at 150lbs. My glucose was 446 and my A1c was 13.8%. I didn’t feel sick or anything - felt totally normal. The reason I went to the doctor - the dermatologist actually! - was for insane hair loss. 

My brand new endocrinologist put me on 2000mg of Metformin a day. My glucose is still averaging around 260 a couple weeks later. So she JUST prescribed me mounjaro at 2.5 for one month, to go up to 5 after that. 

I am so new to diabetes and so new to medications. Any helpful tips or advice is so welcome here. About diet, meds, monitoring.. anything! I am swimming in information 🥵

THANK YOU!!
label: Health

post:

Last month I was diagnosed with t2d. I am in my early 30s and am 5’5” at 150lbs. My glucose was 446 and my A1c was 13.8%. I didn’t feel sick or anything - felt totally normal. The reason I went to the doctor - the dermatologist actually! - was for insane hair loss. 

My brand new endocrinologist put me on 2000mg of Metformin a day. My glucose is still averaging around 260 a couple weeks later. So she JUST prescribed me mounjaro at 2.5 for one month, to go up to 5 after that. 

I am so new to diabetes and so new to medications. Any helpful tips or advice is so welcome here. About diet, meds, monitoring.. anything! I am swimming in information 🥵

THANK YOU!!
label: Health

title: Brand new!! To diagnosis and meds
post:

Last month I was diagnosed with t2d. I am in my early 30s and am 5’5” at 150lbs. My glucose was 446 and my A1c was 13.8%. I didn’t feel sick or anything - felt totally normal. The reason I went to the doctor - the dermatologist actually! - was for insane hair loss. 

My brand new endocrinologist put me on 2000mg of Metformin a day. My glucose is still averaging around 260 a couple weeks later. So she JUST prescribed me mounjaro at 2.5 for one month, to go up to 5 after that. 

I am so new to diabetes and so new to medications. Any helpful tips or advice is so welcome here. About diet, meds, monitoring.. anything! I am swimming in information 🥵

THANK YOU!!
disclosure: she JUST prescribed me mounjaro at 2.5 for one month
label: Health

title: Purpose built vs Victorian flat converted…which one would you choose and why ?
post:
Do you have any personal experience in any or both ? 

Thank you
comment:
I've just moved into a ground floor flat, converted 1910s house in North West London. Lovely space, garden, share of freehold.

Can hear upstairs walking around and closing their doors. Can also hear their landline ringing. So far, have not heard voices or conversations, or the TV. I personally don't mind hearing them walking around and I imagine we will get used to it pretty quickly.
disclosure: I've just moved into a ground floor flat, converted 1910s house in North West London
label: Location

title: Everyday is a battle thinking about death
post:
I have always had bad experiences and now I feel the worst that will happen. Is within 1-2years i will get diagnosed with cancer and i will die.

I am fearing death please help me
disclosure: I have always had bad experiences and now I feel the worst that will happen.
label: Mental_Health

title: Everyday is a battle thinking about death
post:
I have always had bad experiences and now I feel the worst that will happen. Is within 1-2years i will get diagnosed with cancer and i will die.

I am fearing death please help me
disclosure: I am fearing death please help me
label: Mental_Health

title: Everyday is a battle thinking about death
post:
I have always had bad experiences and now I feel the worst that will happen. Is within 1-2years i will get diagnosed with cancer and i will die.

I am fearing death please help me
parent_comment:
Stop thinking about it and start learning about it. Get out of your head and onto YouTube.

Watch Alua Arthur’s and Caitlin Doughty’s content on YouTube. It won’t take away the fear altogether, as it’s 100% natural to fear death, but avoiding engaging with it or denying it almost always makes the anxiety worse. Talk about it. Don’t let yourself spiral in your thoughts if you can help it. 

Also, consider therapy — really. Anxiety is not something that deserves to be ignored.

Start here: https://youtu.be/3IBsAiDeS4M

Second: https://youtu.be/CN7ZD9uw7LQ

Third: https://youtu.be/jVjkeUUxke8
comment:
Agree to learning about it. I had massive fear of death about two months ago. I started following hospicenursejulie and hospicenursepenny on instagram. Ive learned about the dying process and how peaceful it mostly is. And I've learned about death bed visions; those are very comforting actually.

In general; the more I've learned the less I fear. Now my only worry is dying while my kids are young.
label: Time

disclosure: I actually did get diagnosed with cancer

title: Carsales overpriced?
post:
End of the year and finally got my full license so naturally I’m looking to buy a car.

Specifically have a thing for old JDM Silvia’s like an s15 or s14 s2, but through my observations over the past 6 months I’ve noticed huge disparities in prices.

If you were to check on Carsales you have all of these Silvia’s with premium prices that don’t seem to sell or really do anything, however if you move to gumtree of Facebook marketplace the same cars are listed but usually 15-20k cheaper, and all seem mechanically sound. This isn’t even like a few outliers, the entire catalogue of Silvia’s on car sales are priced a lot higher than anywhere else.

I’m just wondering if anyone can give me an explanation to why they are so much more expensive, is there any benefit to buying from car sales rather than another platform that I’m missing ? Is this just a thing with Silvia’s or are other car models priced like this?
disclosure: Specifically have a thing for old JDM Silvia’s like an s15 or s14 s2
label: Interests

title: Carsales overpriced?
post:
End of the year and finally got my full license so naturally I’m looking to buy a car.

Specifically have a thing for old JDM Silvia’s like an s15 or s14 s2, but through my observations over the past 6 months I’ve noticed huge disparities in prices.

If you were to check on Carsales you have all of these Silvia’s with premium prices that don’t seem to sell or really do anything, however if you move to gumtree of Facebook marketplace the same cars are listed but usually 15-20k cheaper, and all seem mechanically sound. This isn’t even like a few outliers, the entire catalogue of Silvia’s on car sales are priced a lot higher than anywhere else.

I’m just wondering if anyone can give me an explanation to why they are so much more expensive, is there any benefit to buying from car sales rather than another platform that I’m missing ? Is this just a thing with Silvia’s or are other car models priced like this?
comment:
There seem to be a lot of cars on Carsales that were put on at ludicrous prices during the pandemic when there was a lot of news about inflated prices. People were just thinking "Well it's worth $20k but if I can get $40k for it I'll sell."

I've been monitoring a couple of cars like this for a year now. It's worth looking at ~~when the ad was posted and~~ how often it's been changed. If it's been on for months then it's probably nonsense.

Of course Carsales has no incentive to flush these off because more cars for sales equals better perception of it as a marketplace.
disclosure: I've been monitoring a couple of cars like this for a year now
label: Interests

comment: I sold my 180sx about 15 years ago for $3000 with all the bullshit, big front mount intercooler bigger fuel pump, injectors, bigger turbo, tein coil overs blahh blahh all the stuff you normally do and when I owned it everyone said is was a piece of shit jap crap, now everyone thinks there awesome and they can't get enough of them
label: Possession

title: Carsales overpriced?
post:
End of the year and finally got my full license so naturally I’m looking to buy a car.

Specifically have a thing for old JDM Silvia’s like an s15 or s14 s2, but through my observations over the past 6 months I’ve noticed huge disparities in prices.

If you were to check on Carsales you have all of these Silvia’s with premium prices that don’t seem to sell or really do anything, however if you move to gumtree of Facebook marketplace the same cars are listed but usually 15-20k cheaper, and all seem mechanically sound. This isn’t even like a few outliers, the entire catalogue of Silvia’s on car sales are priced a lot higher than anywhere else.

I’m just wondering if anyone can give me an explanation to why they are so much more expensive, is there any benefit to buying from car sales rather than another platform that I’m missing ? Is this just a thing with Silvia’s or are other car models priced like this?
comment:
It's mainly a Silvia thing,add on JDM tax and Covid tax. Me and my brother own S15s, paid 8k and 15k for them. Then again, I sold my r33 gtr vspec for $22k back in the day and they're worth a fortune now :( when I think of the number of cars I passed on buying cheap 10 years ago still hurts a little - 180sx for 6k, FD rx7 for 17, s2000 for 12k, r34 GTR for 32.

Any JDM sports car from 20-10 years ago have gone up - evos, sti, rx7, dc2 type r, s2000 etc because young men then are old men now like me who are trying to buy back their youth. Maybe check out more recent cars for the 15k+ bracket, eg brz, megane, civic type r,wrx?
disclosure: I sold my r33 gtr vspec for $22k
label: Possession

title: Why does Fusion crash like that's its job? Is it me?
post:
I've been using Fusion for 5-6 years now. It has always been kind of crashy. I've taken a couple years off, but now I have some projects that require me to jump back in after getting used to MasterCam. 

What do you guys think? Is it pretty seamless these days and I just need a better computer, or F360 still crazy after all these years?
comment:
I fired up Fusion yesterday after getting my license upgraded to the Startup license. I think it crashed about 10 times. Eventually seems to have settled down, but it’s definitely not just you. 

I use a Dell XPS 15 with a 1050 Ti graphics card. I THINK the “fix” was manually downloading the drivers from Nvidia.
disclosure: I use a Dell XPS 15 with a 1050 Ti graphics card
label: Possession

title: Why does Fusion crash like that's its job? Is it me?
post:
I've been using Fusion for 5-6 years now. It has always been kind of crashy. I've taken a couple years off, but now I have some projects that require me to jump back in after getting used to MasterCam. 

What do you guys think? Is it pretty seamless these days and I just need a better computer, or F360 still crazy after all these years?
comment:
Thank you!!! I thought that I was the problem… I have to work on F360 everyday and it’s literally never the case that it doesn’t freeze up and crash every hour or so. First I tried to backtrack it in any way possible including lowest graphics settings. The most annoying thing is that it seems like there smth specific that triggers it (I persuaded myself into thinking it’s when opening the PCB Design linked to the Schematic), but every other time it just freezes before I even get to open a project. And once it first crashed on a day, it crashes multiple times in the following hour ( at least until I restart the notebook) and then it’s just a matter of hours until it starts all over again. And don’t get me even started on the mess with all the recovery files that aren’t linked anymore or you can’t save anymore because you’re not on the team (although single member project) anymore, tf?! I really started to regret making my m1 MacBook Pro my main because I thought it’s some sort of compatibility issue cause it’s a fairly new platform for this software. But I also had multiple crashes (although it seems not that often) on my Win10 with i7-7700k cpu 2080ti gpu 16gb ram and Samsung evo 500 ssd ( but it also could appear less crashing since I don’t use it that often)

I really, really find this unacceptable for a professional tool and it’s also sad that it seems like Autodesk doesn’t want to do much to help with that. I’ve noticed that in the forums they are mostly trying to get out of their way when someone is asking when they are gonna add a feature they promised a year ago… and they’re mostly gonna tell you: oh there’s no deadline but I’ll write it on my list and tell the devs.
Tbh I think that they are more interested in further improving their expensive softwares as revit or inventor and think that this is more than enough development and pace for a mostly free software as 360.
As I started using it years ago i really loved the new modern design, intuitive interface and how you could linke the pcb and simply make a 3d case for it in a splitsecond. I was even an advocate for the merge of eagle, but since then less and less attention has been paid and I think it’s finally time for me to say goodbye and look for an alternative that suits my needs.

Sorry for the rant but it is just so depressing and it felt like the right time once I’ve read your post ;)
disclosure: my Win10 with i7-7700k cpu 2080ti gpu 16gb ram and Samsung evo 500 ssd
label: Possession

title: Homeless vet needs back surgery
post:
My father is a veteran and is homeless (technically he lives in a trailer without electricity on an illegal cannabis farm). He has severe back issues and is scheduled to get back surgery at the VA but doesn't have a place to recover or any support. I'm assuming the VA deals with this stuff all the time. Does anybody have experience with this type of situation? Can they keep him until he is fully recovered?

He's kind of the traditional Vietnam PTSD veteran who wasn't able to integrate back into society. Unfortunately family support is not an option for a plethora of reasons.

Edit: I'm on hold with the homeless veterans program. I would still appreciate any information about options available.
disclosure: My father is a veteran and is homeless (technically he lives in a trailer without electricity on an illegal cannabis farm)
label: Family

title: should I submit a 1470 SAT score to Carnegie Mellon and Duke?

title: Mri being called back
post: Hi everyone , won't make this extremely long but those that's been following me , psoriasis since childhood , curve in since correct with non surgery , backpack in teens and adulthood,  and si pain , in 30s developed joint pains in knee wrist fingers toes , pain in hips , pain in one foot at side and arch part , pain servere on resting and lying down , restless at night as pain in bad , loss of natural lumbar lordosis, nasids gave me stomach issues , now aged 38 was sent to rheumatologist I'm female uk he wanted to built a better picture before giving me a diagnosis,  so sent me for xrays of hip and Lower back and did hla b27 and crp , mri of spinal, now xrays and blood tests I had in July 2022 heard nothing back , mri I had to wait for till Nov 2022 , appointment booked for follow up 5th Jan 2023 as he said report will take a few weeks from mri, however letter landed on my doormat from hospital saying the consultant radiologist doing the report wants me back for a mri with more views of the spine before he completes the report , so now I'm wondering why I'm being called back for more views , what more can be seen on a spinal ? Maybe not clear enough I'm not sure , letter just says he wants more views,  guess I'm wondering if anyone else has had the same , my appointment with rheumatology is still going ahead before the mri scan so I guess he can maybe fill me in , but at this point I'm going to assume either pictures not good enough or something showed up and they need a better angle maybe , so frustrating,  thanks for reading
label: Health
